headline: Constellation Brands Announces Industry Veteran Paula Erickson as Incoming Chief Human Resources Officer
summary: Kris Carey to step down from her current role as EVP and Chief Human Resources Officer and will depart the company in May 2025ROCHESTER, N.Y., April 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Constellation Brands (NYSE: STZ), a leading beverage alcohol company, announced today that Paula Erickson will join the company and assume the role of Executive Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer, effective April 21, 2025.
